text: Badovinci (, ) is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Bogatić municipality, in the Mačva District. The village has a Serb ethnic majority and its population numbering 5,406 people (2002 census). ==Name== The name of the settlement in Serbian is in the plural, and therefore it is grammatically correct to refer to it as "Badovinci are" instead of "Badovinci is". A hypothetical singular version of the name would be Badovinac. ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *Mačva Category:Mačva Category:Populated places in Mačva District
title: Badovinci
